article: a controversial canada-based political consultant testified tuesday in the treason trial of opposition leader morgan tsvangirai that he was asked to help arrange a coup and the killing of president robert mugabe .
abstract: self-avowed former israeli undercover agent testifies on coup plot in zimbabwe treason trial
